Rule.desc: Ensure proper session expiration
Ensure proper session expiration
Avoid using custom MessageDigest implementations
Ensure that 'axis.development.system' is set to "false" in Axis 'server-config.wsdd' files
Ensure that 'axis.enableListQuery' is set to "false" in Axis 'server-config.wsdd' files
Avoid using insecure cryptographic algorithms for data encryption with Spring
Avoid using insecure cryptographic algorithms in Spring XML configurations
Avoid using the javax.crypto.NullCipher class in non-test classes
Avoid using cryptographic keys which are too short
Ensure that 'axis.disableServiceList' is set to "true" in Axis 'server-config.wsdd' files
Avoid defining multiple security roles with the same name in 'web.xml' files
Ensure that the 'Encrypt' directive is specified for each 'items' tag in Axis2 configuration files
Ensure that each filter mapped in a 'web.xml' file has a corresponding definition
Use 'https' instead of 'http' for the 'transportReceiver' and 'transportSender' in 'axis2.xml' configuration files
Avoid using insecure algorithms for cryptography
Ensure that 'InflowSecurity' and 'OutflowSecurity' parameters are specified in Axis2 configuration files
Include an appropriate '<login-config>' element to specify the type of authentication to be performed in 'web.xml' files
Use hash functions with a salt
Avoid storing usernames and passwords in plain text in Castor 'jdo-conf.xml' files
Avoid using plain text passwords in Axis 'wsdd' files
Ensure that passwords are not stored as plaintext and are sufficiently long
Ensure that passwords are not stored as plaintext and are sufficiently long
Restrict access to JSPs in 'web.xml' files by including a security constraint for '*.jsp' files
Ensure that "REST" is disabled in 'axis2.xml' configuration files
Ensure that the 'Signature' directive is specified for each 'items' tag in Axis2 configuration files
Always specify error pages in web.xml
Ensure Session-ID Length is sufficient
Avoid using the SOAP Monitor module
Ensure that each security role referenced in a 'web.xml' file has a corresponding definition
Use 'java.security.SecureRandom' instead of 'java.util.Random' or 'Math.random()'
Ensure that sessions are configured to time out in 'web.xml' files
Ensure that the 'Timestamp' directive is specified for each 'items' tag in Axis2 configuration files
Ensure that all constrained resources are protected with a '<user-data-constraint>' element in 'web.xml' files
Use the SSL-enabled version of classes when possible
Avoid using plain text passwords in Axis2 configuration files
